name: Evil Red Boxes
description:
This is a very changing yet simple game made for the Let's Create Game Jam #1. This is one of the first games I've made and I was the only one working on it so don't expect anything professional. With that, i should add there are no major or game-breaking bugs and over all, i think I've done very well considering I didn't even know how to make a main menu when I started. 

The goal of the game is to destroy all the bad guys in the level in 30 seconds or less without getting hit. It sounds simple but it's really not, as in its really fast paced and will take all the skill you have to complete every level.

The game Features are

  • -36 fun and handmade levels
  • -Grate assortment of powerful guns
  • -Powerful and unique power ups
  • -Multiple kinds of unique enemies
  • -Very fast paced gameplay

Special thanks to Matthew Palaje for the tutorials that made this possible.
